'''Pallad's Dilemma''' is a [[Random World Quest]] that can occur in various places across [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
# Defeat the monsters and save [[Reckless Pallad]].
#* One of two sets of monsters will be randomly selected: {{Enemy|Hilichurl|x=3}} or {{Enemy|Pyro Slime|x=4}}
# Talk to Reckless Pallad

==Gameplay Notes==
* The quest can be failed if all the monsters are killed, but the player runs away too far before talking to Pallad.

==Rewards==
{{Transclude|Random Event|Rewards}}

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Reckless Pallad is in trouble.}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach Reckless Pallad)
:'''Paimon:''' Look over there &mdash; someone is being attacked!
:'''Paimon:''' Quick, help them out before something terrible happens!

;(Talk to Reckless Pallad after defeating the monsters)
:'''Reckless Pallad:''' Thank you Traveler, you saved me!
:'''Reckless Pallad:''' I never expected there to be monsters here.
:'''Reckless Pallad:''' I'm just lucky to have run into you. Please, take these for your trouble.
{{Dialogue End}}
